segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookies with a determined look on his face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balance seems precarious, and I hold my breath, fearing he might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think how brave he must feel—climbing that stool to get a sweet treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I also feel a sense of anger at the risk he’s taking without any adult supervision.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him looks expectant, as if she’s waiting for him to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her raised arm shows her eagerness, yet it seems misplaced in this moment of chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but wonder what will happen if the woman notices them.
segments.speaker: PAR
